Yes I am a newbie. So please don't kill me :)

 I read this in the javadocs for TestRunner

*A test runner either expects a static method suite as the entry point to
get a test to run or it will extract the suite automatically*

What is this supposed to mean?? How will the task run on its own??
-Manu
Help stamp out mental illness, or I will kill you!!
